arm_group.description: The patients received videolaryngoscope for double-lumen tube intubation

brief_summary.textblock:
1. Double-lumen tube intubation is difficult, compared with single lume tube.

        2. McGrath Series 5 videolaryngoscope hase been used in difficult airway management, both
           in anesthetized and awake patients.

        3. But there was little information about McGrath Series 5 videolaryngoscope for
           double-lumen tube intubation.

clinical_study.brief_title: McGrath Series 5 Videolaryngoscope for Double-lumen Tube Intubation

detailed_description.textblock:
In this study, the purpose was to evaluate the success rate and intubation time of McGrath
      Series 5 videolaryngoscope for double-lumen tube intubation in patients without predictors
      of difficult intubation.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  adult patients

          -  thoracic surgery

          -  ASA classification 1-3

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Emergent operation

          -  predicted difficult airway

          -  difficult ventilation

          -  limited mouth opening

study_pop.textblock:
adult patients scheduled for thoracic surgery requiring double-lumen tube insertion for
        one-lung ventilation

intervention.description: McGrath Series 5 videolaryngoscope is one kind of portable videolaryngoscopes, which has been usde in both unexpected and anticipated difficult intubation.

facility.name: Tongji Hospital, Huazhong University of Science and Technology

clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation McGrath Series 5 Videolaryngoscope for Double-lumen Tube Intubation

other_outcome.description: based on the modified Mallampati classification. degree 1 to 4
based on Cormack-Lehane classification. degree 1 to 4

overall_official.affiliation: Huazhong University of Science and Technology

primary_outcome.description: defined as time from inserting blade to mouth to three cycles on capnograph

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Huazhong University of Science and Technology

secondary_outcome.measure: number of successful intubation at first attempt
